basic.description: This laboratory covers the application of the principles of nutrition in the treatment and prevention of specific diseases.
basic.subject: DIE
basic.title: Medical Nutrition Therapy II Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BCH 3023C, BSC 2085, DIE 4243, HUN 3224, PET 3322, and PET 3322L. Corequisites: DIE 4244 and HUN 3226.
